name: Clarity
description:
Made for #JamForLeelah.

Claire is a transgender girl who transforms into a magical girl in her dreams, where she fights monsters that represent her dysphoria and eventual rejection.

(This is a prototype, and the game will be expanded over time.)

Credits:
Serina O'Connell (Amarin) - Lead Programmer, Level Designer
Rofflesia - Graphics Artist, Level Designer
Elizabeth Fisher (Meowsticgoesnya) - Assistant Programmer
Melissa Goad (SweetsParade) - Character Artist
Candace Yuki - Advisor
